{{Unreleased version}}
At least one unreleased development version of the game labelled '''0.0.18a_02''' was developed on June 19, 2009. It shows in-development features later included in [[0.0.19a]] and later releases.

'''[https://web.archive.org/web/20110302010226/https://notch.tumblr.com/post/124718567/glass-looks-pretty-bad-and-sponge Word of Notch post]'''

* '''General'''
** Hotbar.

* '''Blocks'''
** [[File:Glass JE2.png|32px]] [[Glass]]
*** Uses an unpolished and very streaky texture. This texture did not make it into [[Java Edition Classic 0.0.19a|0.0.19a]], but did make a brief return in [[Java Edition Classic 0.0.19a 01|0.0.19a_01]].
** [[File:Sponge JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Sponge]]
